comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open Eclipse (If closed).
2. Close all BIRT editor (If was opened).
3. Push CTRL+R.


More information:
You will see a popup shortcut menu in the right bottom corner of the workbench window. If you push C or click in that menu you will see that action is not occured, because active report is not found. I think this popup menu should be disabled when active report is not found.
We should remove the "create crosstab" shortcut key.

I also found NPE in Error Log view when I press C button or click in that menu (see attachment)
